metadata.title: CVE-2013-3344

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 10 SP4 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T
SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 10 SP4 for x86

metadata.description: Heap-based buffer overflow in Adobe Flash Player before 11.7.700.232 and 11.8.x before 11.8.800.94 on Windows and Mac OS X, before 11.2.202.297 on Linux, before 11.1.111.64 on Android 2.x and 3.x, and before 11.1.115.69 on Android 4.x allows attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.
